# Anotov's Battle Book (Level 17 Evoker)
## Overview
*This steel book weighs 30 lbs. and bears a pair of crossed axes on its cover. Each of the book’s 20 pages is fashioned from a thin sheet of steel, which holds finely tooled runes imparting tactical or strategic advice in addition to describing the page’s spell.*

Centuries ago, a powerful battle mage named Anotov the Bold become infamous for his ability to turn the tide of enormous battles with his well-practiced magic. Ever the thrill-seeker, Anotov was haphazard with recording his magic for posterity. Luckily, though, one of the mage’s many apprentices collected Anotov’s most useful spells into a single tome.

**Protection** The pair of axes animates and attacks (each one is a +*5 [[Wounding (MagWpnSpcAb)|wounding]] battleaxe*, attack +31, damage 1d8+5/x3 plus 1 [[S3.1A-C - Universal Monster Rules A-C (Bestiary 6 Apx)|bleed]]). The axes return to the book’s cover when no unauthorized creature remains within 10 ft. of the book.

**Opposition Schools** Enchantment, necromancy

**Value** 10,225 gp (13,425 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

9th—*[[Meteor Swarm (Spell)|meteor swarm]] <sup>S</sup>*

8th—*costly victory <sup>S</sup>, walking wall*

7th—*[[Axe Storm (Spell)|axe storm]], mass invisibility, prismatic spray <sup>S</sup>*

6th—*chain lightning <sup>S</sup>, field of axes, knockdown wave <sup>S</sup>, greater energy siege shot, tar pool*

5th—*battle plan, energy siege shot, swirl of axes, symbol of striking*

4th—*communal phantom steed, greater magic siege engine, hallucinatory terrain, ice storm <sup>S</sup>, instant siege weapon, telekinetic charge <sup>S</sup>*

3rd—*communal protection from arrows, communal returning weapon, fireball S, force phalanx, outflanking boon, pellet blast, wresting wind S*

2nd—*arrow eruption, flaming sphere <sup>S</sup>, magic siege engine, scorching ray <sup>S</sup>, spontaneous immolation <sup>S</sup>, tactical acumen <sup>OP</sup>* 

1st—*abundant ammunition, burning hands <sup>S</sup>, longshot, magic missile <sup>S</sup>, magic weapon, true strike*

**Preparation Ritual**

**Reactive Axes (Su)** Activate this boon’s effect as an immediate action when you take damage from an opponent’s melee or ranged attack. An axe materializes and attacks the opponent in return, regardless of the range to the opponent. This axe has an attack bonus of 20 + your caster level + your Intelligence modifier, deals 1d8+1/x3 damage, and gains any special properties belonging to the weapon or ammunition that struck you. You may use this boon twice before you expend it.

**Source:** Deep Magic (Kobold Press) pg. 18
